mapper.select: SELECT voucher_id, code, description, type, value, min_spend, start_date, end_date, usage_limit, create_at, update_at FROM voucher
SELECT voucher_id, code, description, type, value, min_spend, start_date, end_date, usage_limit, create_at, update_at FROM voucher WHERE voucher_id = #{id}
SELECT voucher_id, code, description, type, value, min_spend, start_date, end_date, usage_limit, create_at, update_at FROM voucher WHERE LOWER(code) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{code}), '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voucher (voucher_id, code, type, value, min_spend, start_date, end_date, usage_limit, create_at, description) VALUES (#{voucherId}, #{code}, #{type}, #{discountValue}, #{minSpend}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{usageLimit}, NOW(), #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE voucher SET voucher_id = #{voucherId}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, value = #{discountValue}, min_spend = #{minSpend}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, usage_limit = #{usageLimit}, update_at = NOW(), description = #{description} WHERE voucher_id = #{voucherId}
